General.Name: Gulf Keystone Petroleum Ltd
General.Description: Gulf Keystone Petroleum Limited engages in oil and gas exploration, development, and production in the Kurdistan Region of Iraq. The company operates Shaikan field that covers an area of approximately 280 square kilometers, which is located north-west of Erbil. It also provides management, support, geological, geophysical, and engineering services. The company was incorporated in 2001 and is based in Hamilton, Bermuda.

3.Name: Mr. Aaron  Clark
3.Title: Head of Investor Relations & Corp. Communications
